task.name: g.mapsets
task.label: Modifies/prints the user's current mapset search path.
task.description: Affects the user's access to data existing under the other mapsets in the current location.

parameter.name: mapset
parameter.label: Name of mapset (default: current search path)
parameter.description: Name(s) of existing mapset(s) to add/remove or set

parameter.name: separator
parameter.label: Field separator for printing (-l and -p flags)
parameter.description: Special characters: pipe, comma, space, tab, newline

flag.name: l
flag.description: List all available mapsets in alphabetical order

flag.name: p
flag.description: Print mapsets in current search path
